snippet.title: Gallantry Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Gallantry is a Knight Simulator set across Medieval Europe. 
Relive the Tourneys as you compete to become the greatest Knight in all of Christendom, on the way you'll need to upgrade your Equipment, skills and even crew.
Available to Wishlist on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1566360/Gallantry/
